html: Verse 6 is often cross-referenced with the visit of the wise men to the Christ child (see Matt. 2:11). Again, this could be a dual prophecy, but the context of Isaiah is the latter days, when the wealth of the gentile nations will be brought to Zion. These verses thus seem to describe the transporting of wealth from these nations to Zion, where it will be used to adorn the temple ("the house of my glory").
